title: Elementary Mathematics Practitioner Competency Development Program Based on Dynamic Educational Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics fundamentals and teaching experience
context.additional_context: A blended education course for practicing elementary mathematics educators conducted in real-time online environments via smartphones. Measuring practical application skills through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can develop an integrated instructional model combining learner-centered and knowledge-centered teaching methods using dynamic educational system design principles
Learners can design flexible teaching strategies for reconstructing elementary mathematics curricula by utilizing various digital tools
Learners acquire practical competencies to operate and evaluate effective real-time interactive classes in smartphone-based environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
